name: The House (itch) (Luke Madle "Mask")
description:
Description - 

You wake up suddenly in a strange place, and you can't seem to remember how you got here... or who you are. It doesn't seem real, or does it? Use clues and answer questions from the survey. Try to solve the mystery and see if you can escape, "The House"...

Controls are listed after you start the game (Reminder - Press "T" to skip to the survey)

If you get stuck, you can press "z" to skip to the last scene. Make sure not to mess up or you will be sent back to the very beginning

(Some buttons have hidden features, give it a try :D)

This was made in one month during the end of my high school career back in 2019, the team was called "Black Mesa Northwest" and it was for a game competition, which it did win one for a local finalist at the "Regional Video Game Design Contest - Highline Performing Arts Center"! Thanks for playing!

Credits -

Luke Madle
